ygData.subject: Re: POW
ygData.msgSnippet: Foxfingers zigzagged down the hall avoiding fire until he dashed around a corner. he was almost enjoying this. Just like the old days he thought remembering

Foxfingers zigzagged down the hall avoiding fire until he dashed around a
corner. he was almost enjoying this. "Just like the old days" he thought
remembering his days as a legitimate maximal. "By now they've already
blocked off all the normal exits it's up to me to find an alternate one." he
stopped, transformed back to robot, tossed his other grenade behind him to
slow down Drillbit. He was taught to avoid damaging others unless it was
completely necessary. He transformed back to fox and hid in a doorway. He
hoped that Drillbit would think he'd kept running after the explosion. If
not then he'd use hit and run tactics when he came close.


----- Original Message -----
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 08, 2000 6:20 PM
Subject: Re: POW


> ::DrillBit::
>
> He fell when the floor blew out. He chased after Foxfingers. He ran past
> a comp panel, putting the ship on Red Alert. All exits closed off. Red
> lights and alarms sounded. DrillBit kept behind Fox. He opened a link.
> "KitKat, that fox blew a hole in the lab floor. I'm now chasing him in
> the lower levels. I request back up." Fox came into sight, and DrillBit
> opened gattaling gun fire.
>
>
>
>
